rows.label: tlk70000008_04_msg0001
rows.name:
It's a real shame we can't get any
good fighters on this detail. But
there's not much I can do about it.

rows.label: tlk70000008_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Even if I'd like to, I can't
tell other people what to do
with their life. Gwahaha!

rows.label: tlk70000008_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Still, I don't think anyone was
expecting a whole bunch of Gogols
to come charging in here!

rows.label: tlk70000008_04_msg0004
rows.name:
They may just be monsters, sure,
but I guess they have stuff they
want to fight for, as well.

rows.label: tlk70000008_04_msg0005
rows.name:
Friends or family they want to
protect... Homes they want to
keep safe... That kind of thing.

rows.label: tlk70000008_04_msg0006
rows.name:
But I guess there's no point us humans
thinking about all that. You can't get
through life without making sacrifices.
